snippet: A judge gave Jhon Jairo Cruz Trejos more than the mandatory minimum of 10 years in prison in part because of serious allegations that involved attacking Americans.
abstract: Jhon Jairo Cruz Trejos, Colombian man charged with transporting drugs and helping terrorists obtain enriched uranium needed to build dirty bomb, is sentenced to 13 yeas in prison.
lead_paragraph: A judge gave Jhon Jairo Cruz Trejos more than the mandatory minimum of 10 years in prison in part because of serious allegations that involved attacking Americans.

headline.main: Colombian Who Helped Terror Group in Building Bomb Is Sentenced
headline.print_headline: Man Is Sentenced  in Terrorism Case
